comment:
Extracted Variables:
- Coconut oil: number of units of coconut oil to be added
- Lavender: number of units of lavender to be added

Extracted Constraints:
1. The body wash must contain at least 300 units of coconut oil: \( coconut\_oil \geq 300 \)
2. The body wash must contain at most 550 units of both ingredients: \( coconut\_oil + lavender \leq 550 \)
3. There can be at most thrice the amount of coconut oil as lavenders in the body wash: \( coconut\_oil \leq 3 \times lavender \)

Extracted Objective:
- Minimize the total amount of time it takes for the mixture to be effective: \( 0.7 \times coconut\_oil + 0.9 \times lavender \)
